dict.acceptation: 折叠；倒塌；崩溃；（尤指工作劳累后）坐下；

sent.orig: The collapse continued formed karst collapse column.
sent.trans: 溶洞顶板持续塌陷会形成陷落柱。

sent.orig: Bridge collapse waterfront, the collapse of the Tokyo Tower.
sent.trans: 崩溃的海滨大桥桥，倒塌的东京铁塔。

sent.orig: Allow a Fannie Mae to collapse, and the US economy might well collapse with it.
sent.trans: 如果让房利美这样的房贷机构瘫痪，美国经济很可能随之崩盘。

sent.orig: In the karst collapse district, there is relationship between pollution of karst groundwater and karst collapse.
sent.trans: 在岩溶塌陷区，岩溶地下水污染与岩溶塌陷有著密切联系。

sent.orig: If we can predict and defend collapse of femoral head earlier, the collapse will not happen.
sent.trans: 如能早期预测股骨头坏死后塌陷并予以适当处理，则有可能预防头塌陷的发生。
